app_descript:
App Name: Last Empire-War Z Package Name: com.longtech.lastwars.gp

Brief:

Immerse yourself in the post-apocalyptic world of "Last Empire-War Z," a captivating strategy game where you must strategically maneuver to survive an onslaught of zombie forces. Engage in this thrilling multiplayer experience that tests your ability not only to fend off the undead but also to ally and battle with other survivors. Train your armies, leverage the unique abilities of heroes, and write your own survival saga in real-time.

Price:

Last Empire-War Z is inherently free to play, but players have the option for in-app purchases, which can enhance the gaming experience. Be mindful of additional expenses which may arise as you delve deeper into the game. üíµ
